questions.question_text_1: Select the correct match of recurrence relation with corresponding complexity.

questions.question_text_1: Apply the divide and conquer strategy to find the closest pair of points in a set. After dividing the set into two halves and recursively finding the closest pairs in each half, what additional step is required?
question_texts: Apply the divide and conquer strategy to find the closest pair of points in a set. After dividing the set into two halves and recursively finding the closest pairs in each half, what additional step is required?

options.option_text: Perform a linear search for the closest pair
Consider pairs that span both halves
Sort the points by their distances
